ind_learners_faqs.question: Are there prerequisites for taking the classes?
ind_learners_faqs.answer: Most courses have no prerequisites or prior experience required. Some courses are more advanced and have prerequisites. Please see the individual course descriptions for details.

ind_learners_faqs.question: How much do the classes cost?
ind_learners_faqs.answer: While we charge a $100 fee and recommend a $50 donation (any amount over $100 is tax-deductible), fee waivers are readily available.
